# App.js

```javascript
sap.ui.define(["sap/ui/test/Opa5","sap/ui/test/matchers/PropertyStrictEquals","./Common"],function(e,s,t){"use strict";e.createPageObjects({onTheAppPage:{baseClass:t,actions:{iCloseTheMessageBox:function(){return this.waitFor({id:"serviceErrorMessageBox",autoWait:false,success:function(s){s.destroy();e.assert.ok(true,"The MessageBox was closed")}})}},assertions:{iShouldSeeTheMessageBox:function(){return this.waitFor({id:"serviceErrorMessageBox",autoWait:false,success:function(){e.assert.ok(true,"The correct MessageBox was shown")}})}}}})});
```
